lines: Those who are lifting the world upward and onward are those who encourage more than criticize.
The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.
Mind. Body. Soul. These are the three things self-care is all about.
Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
There’s only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that’s your own self.
If your compassion does not include yourself, it is incomplete.
Talk to yourself like you would to someone you love.
We must take care of our families wherever we find them.
Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them and enjoy their riches.
Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
All it takes is one good person to restore hope.
In every conceivable manner, the family is a link to our past, bridge to our future.
Cooperation is the thorough conviction that nobody can get there unless everybody gets there.
The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
Talent wins games, but teamwork wins championships.
Problems can become opportunities when the right people come together.
When there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved.
When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too.
Inspiration exists, but it has to find us working.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
Light tomorrow with today.
Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.
Waste no more time arguing what a good person should be. Be one.
What we know matters but who we are matters more.
Be more concerned with your character than your reputation, because your character is what you really are, while your reputation is merely what others think you are.
The truth of your character is expressed through the choice of your actions.
Character may be manifested in the great moments, but it is made in the small ones.
The capacity to care is the thing which gives life its deepest significance.
Taking care is one way to show your love. Another way is letting people take good care of you when you need it.
I cannot do all the good that the world needs. But the world needs all the good that I can do.
Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It's not.
Kindness can transform someone’s dark moment with a blaze of light. You’ll never know how much your caring matters. Make a difference.
Confidence comes not from always being right, but from not fearing to be wrong.
